Headline: Temporary Southbound Reroute near Columbus/Randolph
ShortDescription: Southbound 124 Navy Pier buses are rtd via Columbus, Monroe, Michigan, Madison, then resume their normal route due to street blockage at Lower Columbus/Randolph

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #124 Navy Pier buses are temporarily rerouted via Columbus, Monroe, Michigan, Madison, then resume their normal route due to street blockage at Lower Columbus/Randolph.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: T#71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute near 71st/Michigan
ShortDescription: 71st/So Shore rr NB via 71st, King, 69th, State & over normal rte; SB via Lafayette, 69th, King, 71st & over normal rte due to fire dept activity nr 71st/Mchgn

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to fire department activity near 71st/Michigan.

  • Northbound buses will operate via 71st, King Drive, 69th, State, then resume their normal route.
  • Southbound buses will operate via Lafayette, 69th, King Drive, 71st, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Irving Park to Fullerton
